mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum, a.DOCNUM, a.USERID, a.SIGNTYPE, a.SIGNSTATE, a.DEPT, a.TEAM, a.DRAFTDATE, a.SIGNFILESRC, a.SIGNTITLE, a.SIGNNOTE, a.SIGNER1, a.SIGNER2, a.SIGNER3, a.SIGNER4, a.SIGNER5, a.ENAME, a.POSNAME, a.TOTALSIGN, a.CURRSIGN from ( select s.DOCNUM, s.USERID, s.SIGNTYPE, s.SIGNSTATE, s.DEPT, s.TEAM, s.DRAFTDATE, s.SIGNFILESRC, s.SIGNTITLE, s.SIGNNOTE, s.SIGNER1, s.SIGNER2, s.SIGNER3, s.SIGNER4, s.SIGNER5, s.ENAME, s.POSNAME, s.TOTALSIGN, s.CURRSIGN from sign s join signline sl on s.DOCNUM = sl.DOCNUM where signstate = 0 and sl.SIGNNING = #{userid} order by s.DRAFTDATE desc ) a where rownum <= 3 )

select * from ( select rownum, a.DOCNUM, a.USERID, a.SIGNTYPE, a.SIGNSTATE, a.DEPT, a.TEAM, a.DRAFTDATE, a.SIGNFILESRC, a.SIGNTITLE, a.SIGNNOTE, a.SIGNER1, a.SIGNER2, a.SIGNER3, a.SIGNER4, a.SIGNER5, a.ENAME, a.POSNAME, a.TOTALSIGN, a.CURRSIGN, a.SIGNNING from ( select s.DOCNUM, s.USERID, s.SIGNTYPE, s.SIGNSTATE, s.DEPT, s.TEAM, s.DRAFTDATE, s.SIGNFILESRC, s.SIGNTITLE, s.SIGNNOTE, s.SIGNER1, s.SIGNER2, s.SIGNER3, s.SIGNER4, s.SIGNER5, s.ENAME, s.POSNAME, s.TOTALSIGN, s.CURRSIGN, sl.SIGNNING from sign s join signline sl on s.DOCNUM = sl.DOCNUM where signstate = 0 and s.USERID = #{userid} order by s.DRAFTDATE desc ) a where rownum <= 3 )
mapper.insert: insert into sign(docnum, userid, signtype, dept, team, signfilesrc, signtitle, signnote, signer1, signer2, signer3, signer4, signer5, ename, posname, totalsign, currsign) values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum))+1, 0) from sign), #{userid}, #{signtype}, #{dept}, #{team}, #{signfilesrc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signtitle}, #{signnote, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename}, #{posname}, #{totalsign}, #{currsign})

insert into SIGNLINE(docnum, signok1, signok2, signok3, signok4, signok5, signning) values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum)), 0) from sign), #{signok1}, #{signok2}, #{signok3}, #{signok4}, #{signok5}, #{signning})
insert into DRAFTINGDOC(docnum, dracontent) values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum)), 0) from sign), #{dracontent})
